{"step_by_step_thinking": "Brachycephaly is a condition characterized by a shorter than typical skull shape. According to the documents, this condition is due to the premature fusion of certain sutures in the skull. The sutures are fibrous joints that unite different bones in the skull. In the case of brachycephaly, the documents mention the fusion of the coronal suture, which unites the frontal bone with the two parietal bones of the skull.", "answer_choice": "D. Coronal suture"}
